name: Incident Response Intelligence
description: Using threat intelligence to enhance cyber incident response efforts.

cards.title: Integrating Threat Intelligence in Incident Response
cards.description: Applying cyber threat intelligence to detect and respond to incidents.
cards.bulletpoints: SIEM Correlation, Threat Hunting, Incident Prioritization

cards.title: Attribution Analysis in Cyber Attacks
cards.description: Tracking threat actors and linking cyber incidents to known adversaries.
cards.bulletpoints: MITRE ATT&CK Mapping, Threat Actor Profiles, IOC Correlation
